name: Battle with PIG-Z (eb-64 inspired game)
description: this is a short game with basic rpg combat, that is based off of what would later be mother 3. for those who don't know, mother 3 started in the 90s, being developed for the nintendo 64 disk drive. To summarize it, it then was going to be on the n64, then for a VERY short time the gamgecube, and then finally the gba.
